Text: FW ASTRIP vs ASN Cc Hi Brad I asked Zimin Lu from research as to which formula is more correct when valuing asian options He replied the ASTRIP is more suitable for the options that we have We will probably continue to use the ASTRIP in our model to remain consistent with the way weve been valuing these options in the past Please let me know what you decide to do on your side Thanks Reno Original Message From Lu Zimin Sent Monday October PM To Casimir Reno Subject Re ASTRIP vs ASN Importance High You should use ASTRIP if The option is on serval month Averaging I am out for a conference Call Bob LEE for more question Zimin Zimin Lu
